name: Under My Silent Words
description:
Will Natalie find her true love again?

Would you help Natalie in order to find her true love again?
Natalie is an ordinary teenage girl whose in a happy relationship with her boyfriend, Lester, until one day he has to moved away to another school, which is quite far away from their hometown, that situation forced them to have a long distance relationship. One unfortunate day, Natalie saw an occurrence that cut up her heart/feelings, what would Natalie do afterwards?

UNDER MY SILENT WORDS is a visual novel wrap up in a coming-of-age, romance genre, which has 3 endings in total, three main characters and poems in it with really emotional scoring music

Some tips from us so you can be more immersed in the sadness while playing the game :D    

    1.    play at night  
    2.    turn off any lights 😳
    3.    get comfy
    4.    wear earphones   
    5.    prepare tissue (optional)
    6.    and ready to play.....

Anywho, this is our first ever visual novel from us(*≧∀≦*)!!!

please share/let us know your thoughts!! thanks for playing~

Playtime : 20-30 minutes
